name: Deep House
description: Emerged in the United States during the mid-1980s, featuring a relaxed tempo and influences from Jazz, Funk, and Soul.

children.name: Lo-Fi House
children.description: Primarily distinguished from earlier styles of outsider house by its stricter reliance on deep house elements, cranky, nocturnal, and nostalgic atmospheres, and a distinct dreamy, lo-fi aesthetic.

children.name: Lo-Fi House
